I'm led by the nose through tugs at my tears

DLG ITM_0

DLG ITM_0
You got a cup of tea! Nice.

DLG SPR_1
Songs take on new sharp tones. "Featureless as an orange, as an orange." I hit the skip button.

DLG SPR_0
Every step feels pre-determined. I can't change it, I can't change them.

DLG SPR_2
Every step feels pre-determined. I can't change it, I can't change them.

DLG SPR_3
I remember when he didn't have a crooked smile. I remember when we would talk. Now we sit in almost-silence, letting the vinyl drown us.

DLG SPR_4
Sometimes he jokes and I am 19 years old again and everything is fine. It will always be fine.

DLG SPR_5
He did it to himself, he did it to himself.

DLG SPR_6
My sister is married in a week. They can't read the speech, they can't say it.

DLG SPR_7
I watched a buzzard hunting pigeons from the old engine house. The moment was lost on both of them.

DLG SPR_8
I am scared of what it means when they refuse my help. Everything is not okay.

END 0


END undefined
We won't know we're in danger until the talons grip our flesh.
